tool.summary: This tool derives the soil water capacity for the given soil moisture potentials (psi) based on pedo-transfer functions. Suggested psi values for field capacity estimation range between 60 hPa (pF=1.8) and 316 hPa (pF=2.5). For permanent wilting point estimation take a psi value of about 15850 hPa (pF=4.2). This tool re-implements the R-script AWCPTF by Hengl as well as the regression approach by Toth et al. (2015). See Hengl et al. (2017), Woesten & Verzandvoort (2013) and Toth et al. (2015) for more details.
